name: Warden Scarecrow
description:
CONTROLS: 
Move with WASD or Arrow Key
Aim with Mouse
Attack and Teleport with Left click or Space Key

Protect the pumpkins from the horde of creepy bunnies! If all 3 pumpkins are destroyed you lose.

This game, all the pixel art and program logic, was originally made for the Trijam 190 with the theme "Surrounded by enemies" in 6 hours

Art: Marcelo Rossato (twitter)
Program: Rodrigo Pereira (twitter)   
Color Pallet: https://lospec.com/palette-list/halloween-palette
